steps.name: request {"jobId": '#(getJobID())',"jobTitle": "Software Engg-2","jobDescription": "To develop andriod application","experience": ["Google","Apple","Mobile Iron"],"project": [{"projectName": "Movie App","technology": ["Kotlin","SQL Lite","Gradle"]}]}

name: com/api/automation/postrequest/createJobEntry.feature
description:
To create the Job entry in the application
Use POST /normal/webapi/add to create job entry in the application
